name: Name Tag
description: This item will rename a weapon. A custom engraved nameplate will be applied to the weapon and viewable in game.

name: Storage Unit
description: The Storage Unit allows you to store up to 1,000 of your surplus items which would otherwise exceed inventory limit. At any time you can move items from your inventory into the Storage Unit, retrieve items back into your inventory, or you can just use it to organize your collectibles.

name: StatTrak™ Swap Tool
description: This item swaps StatTrak™ values between two of the same item type.

name: Charm Detachments
description: Select a weapon with an attached charm. Using a Charm Detachment will detach the charm and return it to your inventory.
